page.title: 15LIGHTCLIFFE STRAY
page.content: The Stray is a main feature of Hipperholme and Lightcliffe & lies between the two.It is a large open space where children can play on the swings & play hide & seek behind the trees.In Winter it is a very good place for sledging.Many people play football there at Weekends.On the Stray is the Memorial for the remembrance of the two world Wars. Written on the Memorial is the following: {R.A.S.C. 16 1E {Verbroedering 10 C {BELGIUM That means that in Brighouse we have a link with Belgium & its called the Ludenstein link. In Belgium they have a road with the same name.When Belgians come over they meet round the Memorial.
